Key Match Events: Nurul Hasan's stumping of Blessing Muzarabani was overturned due to a no ball call.
Musaddek Hossain delivered the final ball that led to Bangladesh's victory.
TV umpire Chris Gaffaney found Hasan had taken the ball before it passed the stumps.
Marais Erasmus called a no ball as per Law 27.3.2.
Bangladesh clinched a thrilling victory after replaying the final delivery.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Law 27.3.1 was also relevant during the final moments of India's clash against Pakistan on October 23.
